DOC.brief_summary: This prospective study patient lateral epicondylitis ( tennis elbow ) randomize one 4 possible treatment . The purpose individually examine efficacy treatment , determine one treatment method effective another . The four treatment : corticosteriod injection , prolotherapy , NSAIDs ( non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ) combine physical therapy , placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Conservative Methods Treatment Lateral Epicondylitis : A Randomized , Prospective Study
